name: sludge
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to poison the target.
short_effect: Has a 30% chance to poison the target.

flavor_text.black_white: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: Unsanitary sludge is hurled at the target. It may also poison the target.
